ygData.subject: Thanks Iskandar
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday I finaly found,thanks to a fellow friend on the game, what I was supposed to tell to Raska. Sorry but it was my first quest. :) Although im 11 lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday I finaly found,thanks to a fellow
friend on the game, what I was supposed to tell to
Raska. Sorry but it was my first quest. :) Although im
11 lvl (not much but getting there), I had the worse
armor and the worse skill choice, etc. etc. Yesterday I
read allot about the skills and the restrictions of
being a monk and all of it. NOW I know what I was doing
wrong... Yesterday too I did all the shackle stuff till
the stone one... Which is good... <br><br>On one of
the Guides, Documents, or Whatever I read Yesterday,
they say that the Fists will be allways better because
of the weight restriction, that two good weapons
will allways weight a lot. Is this true?
<br><br>Another thing, I didn't knew that I had Dodge, so i
didn't invested anything on it, so it seems that i'm not
using it, but I already spent all my skill points
(obviously on the incorrect places :) ) Is there a way of
training the Dodge thing without skill points, or i have
to lvl...<br><br>Thanks
